p: Overall, the VI-IFA and VP1-CODEHOP tests respectively identified 13 and 15 serotypes in northern Taiwan, 2008–2012. It is worth to note that two serotypes (CVB2 and Echo3) were only detected by the VP1-CODEHOP test. Table 4 shows the distribution of the top 5 enterovirus serotypes detected in northern Taiwan, 2008–2012, which shows the overall serotype patterns were similar for the two tests. In addition, CVA2, CVA4, CVA6, CVA10, CVA16, and EV71 were the most prevalent serotypes and they were predominant in different years ( S1 Fig).
